title: Luminary Tour: THINKING OF YOU. I MEAN ME. I MEAN YOU.
title_display: Luminary Tour: THINKING OF YOU. I MEAN ME. I MEAN YOU.
short_description: Connect with fellow Luminary members on a guided small-group tour of THINKING OF YOU. I MEAN ME. I MEAN YOU., a monumental and immersive exhibition of the work of Barbara Kruger.
list_description: Connect with fellow Luminary members on a guided small-group tour of Barbara Kruger's immersive and monumental exhibition.
description:
Connect with fellow Luminary members on a guided small-group tour of THINKING OF YOU. I MEAN ME. I MEAN YOU., a monumental and immersive exhibition of the work of Barbara Kruger.

Open exclusively to Luminary members, this tour requires advance registration and is limited to twelve participants. The tour lasts approximately 50 minutes. View all upcoming Luminary programs.

Physical distancing and other visiting policies must be observed.

Coat and bag check, dining, and valet services are currently unavailable. Find further information on what to expect on our website.

Contact Us

If you have questions or are interested in learning more about Luminary membership, we’d be delighted to hear from you. Please contact us at (312) 443-3735 or luminary@artic.edu.
buy_button_caption:
$50 per person

This tour is limited to twelve participants.
